text: @BorisJohnson Just like your best mate @realDonaldTrump your popularity is sinking like a stone. Why? Because people are tired of your constant lies, your idiotic witterings about biscuits and painting planes while mishandling proper crises like #coronavirus & the #BrexitShambles
